title: Shattered Constellations
goal: Show the global scale of the starfall's impact.
stakes_shift: The world is no longer just one continent; it's a planet in crisis.

bridge.to_next: The arrival of a foreign fleet.

scenes.summary: Lyra uses a repaired telescope to look at the other continents.
scenes.outcome: She sees smoke and void-fire everywhere.

scenes.summary: They realize their victory was only local.
scenes.outcome: The mission must expand to the whole world.

scenes.summary: A fleet of ships with silver sails appears on the coast.
scenes.outcome: The Empire of the Sun has arrived to 'reclaim' the star-shards.

scenes.summary: Kaelen meets with the Admiral, who is a cold, calculating woman named Sola.
scenes.outcome: Sola demands the maps and the shard-hilt.

scenes.summary: Kaelen refuses, leading to a tense standoff on the beach.
scenes.outcome: War with the Empire is now inevitable.

scenes.summary: Lyra finds a way to weaponize the stardust in the valley.
scenes.outcome: They have a defense against the fleet.

scenes.summary: Kaelen looks at the new star, drawing strength from Astra's memory.
scenes.outcome: They are ready for the next fight.
